timeline.bodyText: Can we enable chaining like this on multiple lines?
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.author: fengwang666

replies.bodyText: Can we just disable that rule then and let the humans do the formatting?
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Unfortunately I don't think there is a way to remove the "Chained method calls" rule. If we use the auto format tool of Intellij, we have to choose one of rules.
replies.author: fengwang666

replies.bodyText: Personal preference, but I prefer the multi-line chained calls.
